TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_T’apan, title = T’apan, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/T’apan} }

S.FORM: alang T'apan ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Gpho go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 30 buwan, 38 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 79 kyan ku 30 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 21 kyan ku 8 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, 10 13 . maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na T'apan hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na T'apan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na T'apan hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na T'apan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkraya' na T'apan hya' ga Maybalay. tay 'zil na T'apan hya' ga Blangaw. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
